title: “Tampering civilians’ Statements is a serious matter”, tells Ambassador Amza to the Channel-4 Director at the Screening of “No Fire Zone” in the European Parliament
content: Media Release issued by the Embassy of Sri Lanka to Belgium, Luxembourg & the European Union- Brussels During his intervention at the end of a panel discussion that followed the screening of the film “No Fire Zone: The Killing Fields of Sri Lanka”, held at the premises of the European Parliament on Tuesday, the 14th…
